definitions: the layer of the earth's atmosphere that contains a high concentration of ions and free electrons and is able to reflect radio waves. It lies above the mesosphere and extends from about 50 to 600 miles (80 to 1,000 km) above the earth's surface.
shortDefinitions: layer of earth's atmosphere which contains high concentration of ions and free electrons

definitions: a region similar to an ionosphere above the surface of another planet.
shortDefinitions: similar region above surface of another planet
